properties.description: The animal by products are turned into the gelatin powder used to make gummy worms.
properties.title: Animal By-Product Processing
Brazilian Cow Farms
properties.description: Cow farms are made in Brazil by burning down large areas of rainforest.

properties.title: Slaughter Houses
properties.description: Slaughter Houses in Worsterschire sometimes slaughter the cows from Brazil, but mostly they process the carcasses, and send the products and byproducts to plants in mexico.

properties.title: Trolli Gummy Worm Factory
properties.address: 29 Stella Rd, Cape Town 7441, South Africa
properties.description: Gummy worms are created from Gelatin, Food colors, Sugar, and flavors. They are then packaged and shipped across the globe to different stores and warehouses.

properties.title: Walmart
properties.address: 2001 W Maple Rd, Troy, MI 48084, USA
properties.description: Walmart offers multiple varieties of gummy worms and other gummy candies.
